name: YakYakGames
0:
”Alexa open Yak Yak Games”
”Alexa play Yak Yak Games”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content. This skill can extend the  mic timeout.
Invocation Name: yak yak games
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Yak Yak Games is a hub of the best games on Alexa, use this skill to get a game a recommendation!

⭐Yak Yak Games Unlimited⭐

Yak Yak Games Unlimited users get all the premium features available in Yak Yak Games skills, this ever expanding extravaganza currently includes: Deal or No Deal, Voice Blast, Yak Yak Quiz, Jeff Stelling's Sports Quiz, What Came First?, The Million Dollar Money Drop, Linkee, Trivia Blast, Song Blast & deep breath... Fart That Tune!

To get started, try saying: 'Alexa, open Yak Yak Games.'

Got a question or suggestion? Drop an email to play@yakyakgames.com
